title: Add / update favicons (heart icon)
body_html:
3rd approach on an accurate PR trying to solve #655 .

I generated the favicon based on the .svg icon from the design repo. It's in my opinion out of scope for the Teams App trying to support all use cases for favicons (e.g. Windows Tiles, Android shortcuts, what not) while staying maintainable. However, since "normal" browsers use the .png version and lots of people have retina displays, I at added a 32x32 one, since this already seems to be a standard use case.

Thanx to Bodo's hint, I also added a .ico version to the root (in public/) in order to allow old browsers that don't look at the HTML tags to get the favicon as well.

body:
3rd approach on an accurate PR trying to solve #655 .

I generated the favicon based on the `.svg` icon from the design repo. It's in my opinion out of scope for the Teams App trying to support *all* use cases for favicons (e.g. Windows Tiles, Android shortcuts, what not) while staying maintainable. However, since _"normal"_ browsers use the `.png` version and lots of people have retina displays, I at added a `32x32` one, since this already seems to be a standard use case.

Thanx to Bodo's hint, I also added a `.ico` version to the root (in `public/`) in order to allow old browsers that don't look at the HTML tags to get the favicon as well.
